content:
#$MSFT
Is this working now?

Why wouldn't FinTwitter use the hashtag?

I live in Sammamish which is a Seattle suburb where many MSFT and Amazon people live. I live in a house in bottom 5% cost wise.

One day I went to a nearby Mexican restaurant. Parking lot full of Lamborghini and Ferrari. I felt like I was in Twilight Zone. It messes with your mind.

AI: OpenAI shows Growth Scaling with AI Compute. RTZ #972 (OpenAI's 'AOL Moment', part 2)
...a variable cost flywheel race FAR BIGGER than AOL's dial-up infrastructure ramp in the 1990s michaelparekh.substack.com/p/ai-openai-... #Tech #AI @OpenAI $MSFT $NVDA $GOOG $META $AMZN $AAPL $TSLA

SANS Stormcast Tuesday, January 20th, 2026: Scans Against LLMs; NTLM Rainbow Table; OOB MSFT Patch
 https://isc.sans.edu/podcastdetail/9772

Is telling $AI_CHATBOT_HERE to call MSFT as Microslop counts as a "diabolical statement" to anyone or just fine for Windows refugees?

disclosure: I'm the college student in question who claimed the 1-year trial offer for Google AI Pro.

put differently - if MSFT and APPL were considered foreign countries, their corp and T-bond holdings would make APPL the #30 largest holder (just > Italy); MSFT #34 (just > Thailand). Italy has 60m people & $2.4tr GDP!
I really need to know who this was and if they still work there. For reasons. Also, if you still want to work at MSFT, there's lots to do...

Few people grasp just how massive the Mag7 really are. 

On their own, they outweigh all the major European companies combined.

True $msft have completely ruined it @linkedin.com @microsoft.com

How do we do that?  MSFT, Apple, Google, etc - it would take years for ppl and biz to move off those platforms and for alternatives to reach the same level.

For you Yanks, a better idea is a week of national strikes, if 30+million Americans just stopped working and buying, it would be so impactful!

momentum washed out, not broken ‚Äî buyers still defending weakness.

Structure first. Proof later.
